title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 314.5 - Utilization of authorized provider listing for provision of medical opinions and testimony
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 314.5 - Utilization of authorized provider listing for provision of medical opinions and testimony

State Regulations

Authorized providers under section 25(2-c)(c)(iii) are
those agreed upon by the employer and the union as the exclusive source of all
medical opinions and testimony. Review by the chair of collective bargaining
agreements which provide for the utilization of authorized provider listings
for medical opinions and testimony shall be conducted in the manner set forth
in section
314.2
(a), (b) and
(c) of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
314.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
